00062         internal Obj(Texture2D sprite, float x, float y, int width, int height)
00063         {
00064             this.sprite = sprite;
00065             position = new Vector2(x, y);
00066             visibility = true;
00067             srcRect = new Rectangle(0, 0, width, height);
00068             posRect = new Rectangle((int)x + width / 3, (int)y + height / 3, (int)((float)2 / 3 * width), (int)((float)2 / 3 * height));
00069             origin = Vector2.Zero;
00070             ID = this.ToString() + "_" + new Random().Next().ToString(); // Unique ID of the object.
00071         }

00085         {
